issues.message: Use 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Type>' here; it is a more general type than 'System.Collections.Generic.List<System.Type>'.

Use 'System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<System.Func<Nancy.NancyContext, string, Nancy.Response>>' here; it is a more general type than 'System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Func<Nancy.NancyContext, string, Nancy.Response>>'.

Use 'System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<System.Func<Nancy.NancyContext, string, Nancy.Response>>' here; it is a more general type than 'System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Func<Nancy.NancyContext, string, Nancy.Response>>'.
Use 'Nancy.IObjectSerializer' here; it is a more general type than 'Nancy.DefaultObjectSerializer'.
Use 'System.Reflection.MemberInfo' here; it is a more general type than 'System.Reflection.MethodInfo'.
Use 'System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider' here; it is a more general type than 'System.Reflection.PropertyInfo'.
Use 'System.IO.Stream' here; it is a more general type than 'Nancy.IO.RequestStream'.
Use 'System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider' here; it is a more general type than 'System.Reflection.MemberInfo'.
Use 'System.Dynamic.DynamicObject' here; it is a more general type than 'Nancy.DynamicDictionary'.

Use 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Nancy.Responses.Negotiation.DefaultResponseNegotiator.CompatibleHeader>' here; it is a more general type than 'System.Collections.Generic.IList<Nancy.Responses.Negotiation.DefaultResponseNegotiator.CompatibleHeader>'.
Use 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>' here; it is a more general type than 'System.Collections.Generic.IList<string>'.
Use 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group>' here; it is a more general type than 'System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group>'.
Use 'Nancy.Routing.Trie.NodeData' here; it is a more general type than 'Nancy.Routing.Trie.MatchResult'.
Use 'Nancy.Routing.Trie.NodeData' here; it is a more general type than 'Nancy.Routing.Trie.MatchResult'.
Use 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair<string, object>>' here; it is a more general type than 'System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, object>'.
Use 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair<string, object>>' here; it is a more general type than 'System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, object>'.
Use 'System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal' here; it is a more general type than 'System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal'.
